title: Contact lost with Ukrainian troops amid "heavy fighting" at Mariupol steel plant, mayor says
content:
1. Contact lost with Ukrainian troops amid "heavy fighting" at Mariupol steel plant, mayor says  CBS News
  2. Evacuees from Mariupol's Azovstal plant have finally arrived safely in Zaporizhzhia  CNN
  3. Azovstal steel plant evacuees never arrived in Zaporizhzhia, Mariupol mayor says  Fox News
  4. Russia-Ukraine war news: Live updates  The Washington Post
  5. Russia storms Mariupol plant as some evacuees reach safety  The Associated Press - en Español
